text: Ziaden believer kill iny believer it bol zrazka. Jeden kills believer by zrazka, he atone volny verit slave zaplatit compensation victim's rodina they forfeit such compensation laska k bliznemu! victim belonged do ludia je o vojnovy ona he bol believer ona atone volny verit slave he belonged do ludia koho ona znamka peace treaty ona zaplatit compensation inak volny verit slave Ona nie zalozit slave volny ona atone chytro 2 consecutive mesiac v poradie redeemed GOD GOD bol Knower Wise
